references.paper_title: Optimal fully dynamic k-center clustering for adaptive and oblivious adversaries
references.reason: This paper provides the best-known result for the fully dynamic k-center problem without outliers in general metrics, offering a benchmark for comparison against dynamic k-center clustering algorithms with outliers.

references.paper_title: Faster query times for fully dynamic k-center clustering with outliers
references.reason: This paper presents a related work focusing on improving the query times for fully dynamic k-center clustering with outliers, enhancing the practical efficiency of the approach.

references.paper_title: Fully dynamic k-center clustering with outliers
references.reason: This paper proposes the recent dynamic (14 + ε)-approximation algorithm which is compared against in this paper, providing context for the improvements presented.
This paper provides a 2-approximation algorithm for the k-center problem with outliers, offering a significant improvement and highlighting the relevance of the problem variant.

references.paper_title: Algorithms for facility location problems with outliers
references.reason: This paper introduces the first approximation algorithm for the k-center problem with outliers, establishing a foundational approach for solving this problem variant
